Now, she must keep her criminal and personal lives under control. In no time at all, things get out of hand, and her empire begins to fall apart. Kionna must now demonstrate the proper behavior of a Queen in order to keep her position.

title: Wrong Place
description: A man who cooks methamphetamine goes on the hunt for the former police chief of a small town in order to quiet him before he can offer eyewitness testimony against his family. However, in the end, he discovers that he is up against more than he bargained for as he takes on this task.

title: Paws of Fury: The Legend of Hank
description: A down-on-his-luck hound finds himself in a town of cats in need of a hero to protect them from a villainous scheme to wipe their village off the map. Our underdog must take the role of town samurai and join forces with the peasants to save the day, with the assistance of a hesitant mentor.

title: The Gray Man
description: When Court Gentry, alias Sierra Six, the CIA's most skilled mercenary, discovers dark agency secrets by accident, he becomes a top target and is hunted around the world by his psychotic old colleague Lloyd Hansen and international assassins.

title: The Killer: A Girl Who Deserves to Die
description: A retired hitman whose wife goes on a trip with her friend, and asks him to look after the friend's teenage daughter. Things go awry when he is forced to use a little violence to protect the girl from juvenile delinquents, but then they are found dead and the girl is kidnapped.

title: Death Hunt
description: Set in the late 1990s, once a year a group of men decide to hunt human targets on a remote island. A developer and his mistress go to a cottage to get away, but they are taken hostage, taken to an island, and hunted for fun.

title: Thor: God of Thunder
description: Loki, the evil brother of Thor, has fled Asgard in quest of Yggdrasil, the Tree of the Nine Realms. The power of the universe is concealed within the tree on Earth. Loki intends, with the aid of Fenrir, to kill the tree and rebuild it in his image, therefore gaining absolute power. Thor must now follow Loki to Earth to undertake an epic battle that will determine the fate of both realms.

title: Happy Birthday
description: A motley crew congregates at an upscale hotel for various reasons right after a bill is passed, allowing citizens to carry firearms. A madcap journey reveals everyone’s hidden motives.

title: Thor: Love and Thunder
description: Thor embarks on an adventure unlike any he's ever undertaken: a quest for inner peace. But his retirement is cut short by Gorr the God Butcher, a galactic assassin who seeks the annihilation of the gods. To deal with the threat, Thor enlists the help of King Valkyrie, Korg, and his ex-girlfriend Jane Foster, who, much to Thor's surprise, wields his magical hammer, Mjolnir, as the Mighty Thor. They set out on a perilous cosmic journey together to solve the mystery of the God Butcher's vengeance and stop him before it's too late.

title: The Challenge: USA
description: Extreme reality TV stars from CBS face up in the toughest challenge of their careers. Due to the ever-shifting nature of the game, players may never fully trust anyone, including themselves. The CBS all-stars battle it out for a spot in the forthcoming international "War of the Worlds" tournament.

title: Bullet Train
description: After one too many disastrous assignments, the unlucky assassin Ladybug is resolved to complete his duties without incident. On the world's fastest train, Ladybug's most recent job places him on a collision course with lethal foes from around the world, all of whom have related but opposing agendas.

title: Code Name Banshee
description: Banshee, a freelance assassin, is ambushed by the mercenary who killed her father. This is the start of a complicated story about revenge and family.

title: Hot Seat
description: A former hacker is coerced into breaking into high-level banking institutions, and another man must try to breach the booby-trapped building in order to save the young man from his precarious position.

title: Om - The Battle Within
description: Om, a special forces para commando officer, has been fighting adversaries for so long that he has lost his memory. Now, he is on a mission to protect the country from terrorists. In the midst of battling the obstacles that the quest offers, he uncovers a surprising reality about his life while also coping with amnesia.

title: Jurassic Domination
description: When two armed dinosaurs made by the military attack a small mountain town, it's up to the sheriff to figure out how to stop them before they get away and cause trouble all over the country.

title: 2025: Blood, White & Blue
description: Undercover U.S. agent Bill Wilson makes the bust of his career taking down a cartel leader. Hiding the evidence in his home exposes his family to a brutal targeting on the night of the annual Purge, the deadliest night of the year.

title: Prizefighter: The Life of Jem Belcher
description: Pugilism was the sport of kings at the turn of the 19th century, and a talented young boxer fought his way to become England's champion.

title: Harmony
description: Sophia, a wounded soldier, suspects the military's placement of her in a medical facility isn't for her recovery, but for something far more sinister. The facility, codenamed Harmony, is actually a government program to create telepathy.

title: Slash/Back
description: In an isolated Arctic community, a gang of Inuit females battle an extraterrestrial invasion while attempting to reach the hottest party in town.

title: Fullmetal Alchemist: The Final Alchemy
description: The Elric brothers’ long and winding journey comes to a close in this epic finale, where they must face off against an unworldly, nationwide threat.

title: The Man From Toronto
description: In a case of mistaken identification, the world's deadliest assassin, known as the Man from Toronto, and a New York City blunder are forced to work together at an Airbnb.

title: Ip Man: The Awakening
description: When a teenage Master Ip foils an abduction, he sparks a turf war with a vicious human trafficking network. In retribution, the gang kidnaps one of Ip Man's closest companions and forces him to meet the gang's ferocious boxing champion head-on.

title: Blowback
description: When a master thief is sabotaged during a bank heist and left for dead, he seeks vengeance on his former crew one target at a time. With the cops and the mob closing in, he's in a race against time to reclaim a fortune in cryptocurrency from those who betrayed him.

title: The Princess
description: A lovely, independent young princess who is betrothed to a nasty sociopath is kidnapped and imprisoned in a far-off tower of her father's castle because she refuses to marry him. The princess must defend her family and safeguard the country from her scorned, vengeful suitor who is determined to ascend to her father's throne.

title: Minions: The Rise of Gru
description: Gru, a fan of a supervillain supergroup known as the Vicious6, devises a scheme to become sufficiently evil in order to join them, with the assistance of his minions.

title: The Witch: Part 2. The Other One
description: A young woman awakens in a massive secret laboratory. Then she meets another girl who is attempting to defend her home from a gang. With her unexpected abilities, the mystery girl overthrows the gang, and laboratory personnel set out to find her.

title: Centauro
description: Rafa is addicted to the pure, hot sensations he receives from speed racing, but when the mother of his child becomes involved with drug dealers, he burns rubber to save her.

title: Lightyear
description: Buzz Lightyear, a crew of eager recruits, and his robot sidekick Sox embark on an interplanetary adventure.

title: Terror on the Prairie
description: A pioneering family fights back against a gang of vicious outlaws that is terrorizing them on their newly-built farm on the plains of Montana.

title: Dragon Ball Super: Super Hero
description: The Red Ribbon Army, a previously disbanded evil organization by Goku, has been rebuilt by a group of people who have created new and mightier Androids, Gamma 1 and Gamma 2, and seek vengeance on Goku and his family.

title: Satria Dewa: Gatotkaca
description: Realizing that he’s the lineal descendant of Gatotkaca from Pandawa family, Satrio must fight his way to unlock the power lies inside him and face Aswatama, the remaining Kurawa warrior who lives on to destroy the world by changing the history of Bharatayudha.

title: The Prey: Legend Of Karnoctus
description: A unit of U.S. soldiers become trapped in a cave in Afghanistan and are hunted by a terrible beast known as Karnoctus.

title: Buried in Barstow
description:
Overview:
                                                Follows Hazel King, a single mother determined to protect her daughter from the life she once had while defending and protecting those who can't protect themselves.

title: Wolf Hound
description: An American pilot of Jewish descent gets shot down behind enemy lines. With just his wits and a sidearm, he must outwit a cunning foe, liberate his captured crew, and stop a conspiracy that could alter the direction of the war.

title: Double Threat
description: A young woman with multiple personalities becomes connected with a man on a cross-country trek to disperse his brother's ashes while being pursued by brutal mobsters.

title: White Elephant
description: When he is forced to do things for the mob, an ex-marine enforcer must battle his conscience and code of honor.

title: The Siege of Robin Hood
description: In a time of anarchy and oppression, the once-great nation of England teeters perilously on the edge of a widespread revolt. After the ruthless Sheriff of Nottingham orders a terrible attack on his family, a young man named Robin swears bloody vengeance on the perpetrators and vows to deliver freedom to those enslaved by the tyrannical rule of the kingdom. Robin and Lancelot organize a dangerous squad of exiled fighters and skillful mavericks to unite the villagers for an explosive all-out assault on the Crown's castle, with advice and guidance from the recluse magician Merlin.

title: Jurassic World Dominion
description: Second sequel to Jurassic World.

title: There Are No Saints
description: A man is in jail for something he did not do. When his wife is killed and his son is kidnapped and taken to Mexico, he comes up with a complicated and dangerous plan to save his son and get revenge for his wife's death.

title: Interceptor
description: A lieutenant of the Army uses her years of tactical training to save humanity from sixteen nuclear missiles fired towards the United States, while a savage coordinated attack threatens her remote missile interceptor station.

title: Top Gun: Maverick
description: After more than 30 years as a Navy aviator, Pete Mitchell is where he belongs as a brave test pilot, avoiding rank advancement that would ground him.

title: Teen Titans Go! & DC Super Hero Girls: Mayhem in the Multiverse
description: Lex Luthor, assisted by an ancient Kryptonian power, brings together the world's Super-Villains in order to capture all of Earth's Super Heroes... It's just the DC Super Hero Girls and the Legion of Doom left to stop them. Our heroes must cross realms to rescue their fellow Super Heroes from the Phantom Zone, but a lucky wrong turn brings them to Titans Tower, where they meet much-needed friends in the Teen Titans!

title: County Line: All In
description: When an unpopular attorney is murdered on the county line, Maksville County Sheriff Alden Rockwell must unwillingly collaborate with the freshly elected York County Sheriff Jo Porter. As the murderer continues to hit, they must learn to put aside their differences and work together to stop him.

title: Jackass 4.5
description: Using shocking, never-before-seen film, observe the making of the Jackass crew's final attempt at crazy exploits.

title: Top Gunner: Danger Zone
description: A plane carrying 800 passengers must fly quickly and low, above farmlands, suburbs, and densely populated cities, or the tons of explosives on board will detonate. When an elite unit of US Air Force fighter jets is dispatched to provide escort, they encounter an unidentified squadron of warplanes, sparking a horrific air battle that threatens to wipe out all life in the sky and on the ground.

title: Last Seen Alive
description: Will is driving his soon-to-be ex-wife Lisa to her parents' house, but when they are stopping at a gas station, Lisa unexpectedly vanishes without a trace. Will was with Lisa at the time.

title: The Roundup
description: Ma Seok-do, the 'Beast Cop,' travels to a faraway country to extradite a suspect, but upon his arrival, he discovers further murder cases and learns about a savage killer who has been committing murders against tourists for years.

title: Vandits
description: A teenage posse, known as the Vandits, attempts to pull off a ridiculous heist.

title: Vendetta
description:
Overview:
                                                When his daughter is murdered, William Duncan takes the law into his own hands, setting out on a quest for retribution. After killing the street thug responsible for her death, he finds himself in the middle of a war with the thug's brother, father, and their gang, who are equally hell-bent on getting even. What ensues is a tense back-and-forth game of vengeance. By the end, William comes to find that the quest for revenge never has a winner.

title: Dark Cloud
description: Following a horrible injury, a woman submits herself voluntarily to artificial intelligence for rehabilitation.

title: Shark Bait
description: After stealing a couple of jetskis for a weekend of fun, a group of buddies crashed into each other head-on while racing out to sea. With a gravely injured companion in tow, they fight to find a route home while predators prowl below.

title: Shin Ultraman
description: The Japanese government forms a special task force to combat the sudden emergence of enormous monsters across the nation. Soon, the crew is surprised to encounter a gigantic silver humanoid that appears whenever a space monster assaults!

title: Song of the Assassins
description: After completing his training, an elite young assassin embarks on his first mission and is quickly ensnared in an intricate plot laid by powerful people pulling strings from the shadows. Upon failing to complete the assignment, he is forced to go on the run—from the government and rival assassin groups alike—as he seeks to unmask the players behind the conspiracy.

title: Lockdown
description: Three crooks, led by a crazed genius named McMasters, seize a police station in Los Angeles and threaten to kill everyone inside unless a hefty ransom is paid. Roger Kinkaid, an FBI special agent, utilizes his vast knowledge to attempt to outwit the crooks and save the hostages, but one concern remains: even if they receive their ransom, how can they possibly escape?

title: Respect The Jux
description: In pursuit of the American Dream, a corrupted young man travels to the United States and establishes a gang of thieves.

title: The Takedown
description: Ousmane Diakité and Francois Monge are two police officers with vastly distinct styles, histories, and careers. The unusual duo are reunited for a new investigation spanning France. What appeared to be a straightforward drug transaction turns out to be a much larger criminal case fraught with danger and unexpected comedy.

title: Thar
description: A experienced officer sees a chance to prove himself when murder and a gruesome torture scheme shock a desert community.

title: Black Site
description: A squad of officers stationed in a labyrinthine top-secret facility must fight for their life against Hatchet, a clever and infamous high-value captive. When he escapes, his sinister and lethal purpose has far-reaching and disastrous effects.

title: Doctor Strange in the Multiverse of Madness
description: Dr. Stephen Strange continues his investigation on the Time Stone following the events of Avengers: Endgame and Spider-Man: No Way Home. However, an old friend turned foe aims to destroy every sorcerer on the planet, upsetting Doctor Strange's plans and leading him to unleash a terrible horror.

title: Sniper: The White Raven
description: Mykola is a peculiar pacifist who has a strong desire to contribute positively to the world. When the fighting starts in Donbass, Mykola's innocent world comes crashing down around him when his pregnant wife is murdered by the militants and his house is set on fire. After he has fully recovered, he makes a pivotal choice and joins a sniper company. After confronting the individuals responsible for the death of his wife, he experiences a breakdown on an emotional level and begins planning "sniper terror" for the adversary. He is spared a death that would have been pointless thanks to his instructor, who suffers a fatal injury herself. Mykola has been left with a "scar" after the passing of a close friend, and as a result, he is willing to give up his own life.

title: Pride Jewel
description: After their little hamlet in Armenia was destroyed by an earthquake, a father and son travel to the San Francisco Bay Area. Andre, angry and bitter at his father's tangled infidelity, swiftly becomes engaged with a bunch of dangerous jewel thieves led by his father's boyhood enemy, Cyrus. The only way out is vengeance, and redemption is nowhere to be found.

title: Constantine: The House of Mystery
description: John Constantine awakens at the creepy House of Mystery, unable to recall his journey. He is accompanied by his friends. Sadly, they keep turning into devils and ripping him apart!

title: Fortress: Sniper's Eye
description: Robert undertakes a daring rescue to save Sasha, the widow of his old rival Balzary, weeks after the deadly assault on Fortress Camp. However, it appears as though Sasha has her own diabolical plans back at the camp's command bunker. Robert is greeted with a familiar figure he thought he'd never see again as a new attack breaks out...

title: 4 Horsemen: Apocalypse
description: A small band of scientists must race against time to stop a chain of worldwide tragedies that may signal the apocalypse.

title: Corrective Measures
description: Set at San Tiburon, the world's most hazardous maximum-security prison and home to the world's most treacherous superpowered criminals, where tensions escalate between the inmates and staff, resulting in chaos that engulfs the jail and turns order on its head.

title: Green Ghost and the Masters of the Stone
description: Charlie, a car salesman in a Texas border town, moonlights as a masked Lucha libre wrestler known as "Green Ghost." When unknown assailants arrive in search of an otherworldly emerald, Charlie discovers he possesses superhuman abilities. Charlie is told that he is part of a secret warrior "triad of light" with his childhood friend Marco and Marco's sister Karina, led by La Nana, as he learns to fight from the unconventional Master Gin. They've been chosen to protect humanity from Drake, the Mayan apocalypse's embodiment.

title: Memory
description: Alex, a hired killer, becomes a target after he refuses to do a job for a dangerous criminal organization. Alex has the skills to stay ahead of the crime ring and the FBI, but he has a big problem: he is losing his memory badly, which affects his every move. Alex has to think about every decision he makes and who he can really trust.

title: Silverton Siege
description: Three anti-apartheid freedom fighters are held hostage in a bank after a failed sabotage mission, and it's very dangerous for them. Based on a real story.

title: Lord of the Streets
description: When Jason Dyson refuses to have his favorite fighter throw an MMA contest, a notorious gangster collects his debt by killing the fighter and kidnapping Jason's daughter. Now he must train a prisoner to fight five subterranean fights in a row in order to save her.

title: The Unbearable Weight of Massive Talent
description: Nick Cage must accept a $1 million offer to attend the birthday of a hazardous superfan while being creatively unsatisfied and risking financial disaster. Things take a shocking turn when Cage is recruited by a CIA officer and forced to live up to his own fame, channeling his most iconic and adored on-screen characters in order to save himself and his family.

title: Yakamoz S-245
description: After a disaster strikes the Earth, a marine biologist on a submersible research mission must battle to advance the process into a conspiracy.

title: 9 Bullets
description: A former burlesque dancer turned author (Lena Headey) discovers a second shot at life and redemption as she tries everything to save a little neighbor who witnessed his parents' murder. Now on the run from the local crime boss (Sam Worthington), who also happens to be her ex, she makes a desperate attempt to rescue the youngster.

title: K.G.F: Chapter 2
description: The blood-soaked land of Kolar Gold Fields (KGF) has a new ruler: Rocky, whose name makes his enemies afraid. Rocky's friends see him as their savior, while the government sees him as a threat to law and order. His enemies want revenge and are plotting to bring him down. As Rocky keeps trying to be the best, he will face bloodier fights and darker days.

title: Monkey Enters Lanka
description: When a particular princess vanishes, a mythical folk hero monkey is once again summoned, his name dreaded across the heavens and hells.

title: Agent Game
description: A CIA police officer locates himself the target of a rendition operation after being scapegoated for the fatality of an interrogation subject.

title: Yaksha: Ruthless Operations
description: Nicknamed after a human-devouring spirit, the merciless leader of an international black ops squad undertakes a perilous mission in a city teeming with spies.

title: Jurassic Island
description: Ava reveals the whereabouts of her missing father to an unchartered Island; a legendary lost globe uncovered before them by her grandfather. Joined by a group of travelers as well as scientists, they come to Jurassic Island where it becomes clear that the previous team had actually run into catastrophe. Dinosaurs and toxic leeches suggest it's no more a search for her father, however a battle for survival.

title: Graves
description:
Overview:
                                                Graves Police Officer, Mark Brody, embarks on a journey to bring criminals to justice while Michael Laforte is the hard-drinking, ruthless criminal mastermind who doesn't play by the rules. Clyde Baxter, Matt Goldberg, Pedro Dominguez and the rest of a gang of ex-military men use their expertise and tactical skills to evade the law. His crew soon finds themselves on a direct collision course with Special Agent Mark Brody and the Graves Task Force as the criminals hatch an elaborate plan for a seemingly impossible heists all around the city.

title: Alien Sniperess
description: A women sniper on army leave promises to meet her fiancé's passing away desire until she encounters an aggressive alien invasion and is tasked with saving many lives.

title: WWE WrestleMania 38 - Saturday
description: The most stupendous two-night event in WrestleMania history begins. “Stone Cold” Steve Austin confronts Kevin Owens on “The KO Show.” Ronda Rousey challenges Charlotte Flair for the SmackDown Women’s Title. Becky Lynch defends the Raw Women’s Championship against Bianca Belair.

title: Boon
description: Hireling Nick Boon is trying to atone for his life as an enforcer for a ruthless syndicate. Ranging from his past, Boon moves to a remote area in the pacific northwest where he meets a having a hard time widow and her boy. When he finds both living in anxiety of a criminal authority, Advantage recognizes the only means to shield them is to do what he does ideal: kill.

title: Hunting Ava Bravo
description: Buddy King, a multimillionaire sportsman, relaxes on his remote mountain estate by hunting captive humans. Ava Bravo, his most recent victim, is a difficult opponent.

title: The Northman
description: Prince Amleth is on the verge of becoming a man when his father is assassinated brutally by his uncle, who also kidnaps the boy's mother. Amleth is now a Viking on a quest to rescue his mother, assassinate his uncle, and revenge his father two decades later.

title: Eraser: Reborn
description: It is based on U.S. Marshal Mason Pollard who is specialized in engineering the fake deaths of witnesses that leaves no trace of their existence.

title: Crawlspace

title: Sniper: Assassin's End
description: Brandon Beckett, a Special Operations sniper, has been named as the prime suspect in the murder of a foreign dignitary on the eve of signing a high-profile trade agreement with the United States. After narrowly avoiding death, Beckett realizes there may be a dark operative within the government and teams up with the only person he can trust: his father, legendary sniper Sgt. Thomas Beckett. Both Becketts are on the run from the CIA, Russian mercenaries, and Lady Death, a Yakuza-trained assassin with sniper abilities equal to those of both famed sharpshooters.

title: Greyhound
description: A Navy Officer Commands the Greyhound Throughout WWII

title: Greyhound
description: A first-time skipper guides a convoy of friendly ships across the perilous waters of the "Black Pit" to the front lines of World War II. Without air support for five days, the captain and his convoy must face the enemy Nazi U-boats in order to give the allies a chance to win the war.

title: Becky
description: A teenager's weekend at a lake cottage with her father goes awry when a gang of criminals wrecks havoc on their life.

title: Revenge Ride
description:
Overview:
                                                Maggie becomes a strong and ruthless member of the all-female Dark Moon gang led by the merciless Trigga, and the all-female motorcycle gang look after each other as they patrol the streets in the small town.

title: Easy Does It
description: Two small town buddies race across 1970s USA on a treasure hunt turned crime spree.

title: The Last Days of American Crime
description: In the not-too-distant future, as a last response to crime and terrorism, the United States government intends to broadcast a signal that will make it impossible for anybody to breach the law intentionally.

title: Punching and Stealing
description: After joining an underground vigilante faction to fight white collar financial criminals in the streets off the Las Vegas strip, a jaded IT Coordinator finds himself fighting against white collar financial criminals in his own backyard, only to discover that those he loves may be his real adversaries. He must choose between seeking vengeance and pursuing a relationship with his new fiancee, Jen. The story was inspired by a true story of corporate deception.
